column2: "I was just speaking with Mr. Kotoshiro... I was just wondering how the Shironians can fight the Darkers and still be okay?"
"...You mentioned this earlier. I'm not entirely sure what exactly you mean. Are you suggesting we haven't the means to fight them?"
"I am. Without the power of Photons, you can't kill Darkers completely, so you run the risk of becoming infected by their remnants."
"Mr. Kotoshiro, you've likely seen for yourself how [Double] has been manipulating the Kuronites."
"...And despite our constant battles with them, we Shironians fail to exhibit any signs of infection..."
"O foolish Kotoshiro! 'Tis far from mysterious. There exists aught to explain it."
"All inhabitants of this planet art under its divine protection. Of course such trifling malice would be purged."
"But Lady Sukuna-hime, that fails to explain the Kuronite's violent behaviour."
"Mm.... 'Tis true... The Kuronites should be protected by the selfsame divine protection..."
"Perhaps they art under some manner of deception wrought by those uncanny children?"
"'Tis passing likely they could have been decieved if those children had assumed the title of Miko themselves."
"Well, in any event, ye both needn't fuss over it. There's naught for it but for us to defend ourselves."
"T'will serve as a good lesson for the Kuronites, whose larger frames have led to their arrogance. May they be utterly routed."
